name: POD (itch) (Space Magic Games)
description:
Humans have deployed you on an inhospitable planet. Terraform the planet for your cryogenically frozen humans and protect them from the planet's aliens.

POD is an isometric game inspired by real-time strategy games and base builders. It is being developed in Unity by Space Magic Games, a team of final-year students from Swinburne University.

Credits:

  • Laura Barberio: Lead Writer, Designer, QA Tester
  • Sam Huffer: Lead Programmer (Gameplay, AI, Tutorial)
  • Jason Lu: Lead 3D Artist (Technology, Minerals), Animator
  • Thomas Middelmann: Lead Environment Designer and Programmer, 3D Artist (Terrain)
  • Samson Orchard: Lead Designer, Programmer (Audio, UI, Mini Map)
  • Cody Philip: Lead Audio and UI Programmer, Programmer (Gameplay)
  • Khang Trinh: Lead Technical Artist, Lead UI/UX Designer, Programmer (VFX, UI), QA Tester
  • Ng Hong Wee: Lead Producer, Designer, Lead Marketer

Our thanks to our composer from Melbourne Polytechnic, Myles Masarei, and our lecturer Andrew Trevillian and supervisors Clinton Woodward and Charlotte Pierce for their professional input and feedback.
